entries.npc_1_1: Feeling adventuresome? I know where you can find a good fight, and help with a just cause at the same time. Fort Tusken. In fact I have a friend who went there to try and rid the place of those Sand People.
entries.npc_2_1: Oh, wonderful. I'd do it myself, but I'm afraid those Tuskens would get me before I knew it. I doubt he's still alive out there, but if you see my friend, tell Old Ben I said "Hi". Thanks again, friend.
entries.npc_3_1: I don't blame you. I'm scared of them myself. Well, it didn't hurt to ask. Thanks anyway.
entries.npc_4_1: I'm not sure. He said he knew a good trick on scaring them away, but said it was a secret. All I know is that he left one day with some kid and that's the last I saw of him.
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Oh, wonderful. I'd do it myself, but I'm afraid those Tuskens would get me before I knew it. I doubt he's still alive out there, but if you see my friend, tell Old Ben I said "Hi". Thanks again, friend.
entries.npc_reset: I don't blame you. I'm scared of them myself. Well, it didn't hurt to ask. Thanks anyway.
entries.player_2_1: Sorry, I'm scared of Sand People.
entries.player_3_1: How was he planning on getting rid of the Tuskens?
entries.player_reset: I've decided to stop looking. I have other things to do.
entries.player_sorry: Not yet. I am still looking.
entries.waypoint_description_1: Originally the first Human settlement on Tatooine, Fort Tusken has been home to Sandpeople for over a century.
